title: (x) GMR magazine cover techno faces - Seize, Distilla {Angel}
content:
Can anyone identify the fonts used on the covers of this magazine? I think this was asked here once before a couple of years ago, but the search feature doesn’t allow me to search for anything under four characters, apparently.

[http://i27.tinypic.com/344schy.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423184627/http:/i27.tinypic.com/344schy.jpg "http://i27.tinypic.com/344schy.jpg")  
 [http://i28.tinypic.com/15ey6wg.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423184627/http:/i28.tinypic.com/15ey6wg.jpg "http://i28.tinypic.com/15ey6wg.jpg")

 [‹ (x) GreenSource magazine logo light sans - Interstate {Rainer}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423184627/http:/typophile.com/node/44148 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Enduring Love movie poster - Favrille, Garamond {Nick Cooke, Lex} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423184627/http:/typophile.com/node/44127 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tartarus

comments.content:
Thanks.

What about the logo, though?
It is quite likely the logo was custom designed, although I can’t confirm anything.
